name: analytic
effect: This Pokémon's moves have 1.3× their power when it moves last in a turn. future sight and doom desire are unaffected.
short_effect: Strengthens moves to 1.3× their power when moving last.

flavor_text.sun_moon: Boosts move power when the Pokémon moves last.
flavor_text.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: Boosts move power when the Pokémon moves last.
flavor_text.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: Boosts move power when the Pokémon moves last.
